body: The style for test names in gtest is generally `AllCamelCase` without underscores. Please replace the underscore names with `EverythingCamelCaseAlways`
body_html: The style for test names in gtest is generally AllCamelCase without underscores. Please replace the underscore names with EverythingCamelCaseAlways
body_text: The style for test names in gtest is generally AllCamelCase without underscores. Please replace the underscore names with EverythingCamelCaseAlways
